<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/admin/workspaces/{workspaceId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the details of the given workspace.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"workspaceId","in":"path","description":"Workspace numeric identifier","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Workspace update request","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"visibility":{"type":"string","enum":["PRIVATE","SHARED"],"title":"Visibility"},"description":{"type":"string"},"fullName":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateWorkspaceRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"OK","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"workspace":{"required":["fullName","name","visibility"],"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","nullable":true},"name":{"maxLength":40,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z\\d](?:[a-zA-Z\\d]|[-_](?=[a-zA-Z\\d])){1,38}$","type":"string"},"fullName":{"maxLength":100,"type":"string"},"description":{"maxLength":1000,"type":"string"},"visibility":{"type":"string","enum":["PRIVATE","SHARED"],"title":"Visibility"},"dateCreated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"lastUpdated":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"Workspace"}},"title":"DescribeWorkspaceResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
